tasks.label: Convert Frontend to TypeScript
tasks.command: npx --yes --package typescript --package @types/react --package @types/react-dom --package @types/leaflet --package @vitejs/plugin-react --package @types/react-leaflet --package vite --package @types/node tsc --init && npm install --save-dev typescript @types/react @types/react-dom @types/leaflet @types/react-leaflet @types/node && npx --yes --package @vitejs/plugin-react vite --force && npx --yes --package typescript --package @types/react --package @types/react-dom --package @types/leaflet --package @types/react-leaflet --package @types/node tsc --build
